long_description: Sugoi Resistor booties fit over your bike shoes for a warm, highly water-resistant defense against cold feet in rainy weather. Made from a fleece-lined rubberized laminate that keeps water out and heat in. Exterior seam-sealing along center seam of bootie helps keep feet dry. Bottom of bootie is open with elastic rip-and-stick strap for easy pull-on. Durable locking zips with inner flap and garage. Reflective piping along ankle zips. Sugoi Resistor booties have an 8 in. height. Closeout.
short_description: Sugoi Resistor booties fit over your bike shoes for a warm, highly water-resistant defense against cold feet in rainy weather.
